root.name: Nurarihyon no Mago: Hyakki Ryouran Taisen
root.description: Nurarihyon no Mago: Hyakki Ryouran Taisen is a 2D fighting game for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. It is based on the Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan manga, and is being developed by Arc System Works and Konami. The game will be released in Japan November 17, 2011.
